With the threat of 14... BxB 15 PxB QxP ch.
Trying to defend the threat by adding a guard to the B. But...
...I simply remove the guard. BxR is impossible becuase of the pin.
Probably a frustration move.
I follow up with my plan.

Twice guarded, the Knight looks safe. But...
Removing a guard. Whether the recapture is with the Rook or the Queen, either way the Knight on N3 falls.
I choose to capture with the Q, forcing the exchange of Queens and a won ending.

"Jesse" could have resigned here, but he let me have the honor of checkmating. I don't know whether he actually didn't see it, being half-drunk, or whether he chose to let me win a won game with a mate.

After this, we tossed around a football and a Frisbee with the kids, in spite of inclement weather. Thankfully, the backyard of "Jesse"'s house is covered... it's part of a housing complex, and they have a covered play area for rainy days.
